name: @scramjet/samples
description: A collection of example applications for Scramjet Cloud Platform.

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.pack: export DIST_DIR=$PWD/dist/; mkdir -p $DIST_DIR; scripts/run-script.js -w packages -e 'si seq pack ./dist -o ${DIST_DIR}/$(basename $(readlink -f ../))-$(basename $(readlink -f .)).tar.gz'
scripts.clean: LOCAL_PACKAGES=true scripts/run-script.js -w packages clean && npm run clean:root

author: Scramjet <open-source@scramjet.org>
